description: This dashboard shows status of Master, Antelope, Zed, Yoga, Xena, Wallaby, Caracal puppet promotion pipelines

targets.query: SELECT "job_name", "result", "duration", "pipeline",  "log_url" FROM "build" WHERE ("project" = 'rdoinfo' AND "job_name" =~ /weirdo-yoga-promote-*/ AND "job_name" =~ /stream-9/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "result", "duration", "pipeline",  "log_url" FROM "build" WHERE ("project" = 'rdoinfo' AND "job_name" =~ /weirdo-yoga-promote-*/ AND "job_name" =~ /stream-8/ ) AND $timeFilter

title: Puppet Promotion Pipelines
